message: Before trying to re-invent the wheel, is there an existing app that does something like this?  I want to query AD for a person, store the operator id.  Autocomplete would be the interface of choice.
This should be a somewhat trivial task, but I'm a newbie, and didn't want to start from scratch if the functionality already existed.  Would certainly be a good learning project.
it is fairly trivial, done stuff like this before, but only for querying a database, even connected filters (city, area, street) etc. Basically make a custom form widget
have a composed widget of text input and hidden input, the js would put the id of the selected person in the hidden input, then validate if the id and person exist and match in AD
